title: The Favorites - NFL Week 9 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 9 Gambling Preview
description:
Fresh off scratching and clawing their way to a Kansas City Chiefs survivor pool win on Monday Night Football, Action Network stalwarts Chad Millman and professional bettor Simon Hunter return to preview the entire NFL slate for gamblers everywhere. Together they go through a tricky Thursday Night Football spot, they play a round of Simon Says, and climb into the foxhole to fade Kliff Kingsbury in November. They also sound the beloved Viking Horn, and spin the wheel of Scooch Roulette!

IND NYJ - 10 MIN

ATL NO - 12 MIN

LV NYG - 16 MIN

NE CAR - 17 MIN

MIN BAL - 20 MIN

CLE CIN - 22 MIN

BUF JAX - 26 MIN

HOU MIA - 32 MIN

DEN DAL - 33 MIN

LAC PHL - 35 MIN

GB KC - 37 MIN

SF AZ - 40 MIN

TEN LAR - 43 MIN

CHI PIT - 44 MIN

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
